main_definition: Policies refer to a set of principles, guidelines or procedures established by an organization or governing body to direct their actions and decisions towards achieving specific goals.

meanings_and_examples.example: The government has implemented strict policies on immigration.
A company's policies regarding workplace safety and conduct are strictly enforced.
Hospitinas have policies against accepting gifts from pharmaceutical companies to avoid conflicts of interest.
The school has implemented a policy requiring students to wear helmets while riding bicycles on campus.
A nonprofit organization's policies include long-term plans for community development and sustainability efforts.
